meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being social with members of the same sex.
meanings.sent1: Homosociality is evident in the close friendships between boys in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: In many cultures, homosociality plays a significant role in shaping social dynamics.
meanings.sent3: At the all-boys school, homosociality was so strong that they formed a secret club.
meanings.sent4: The homosociality among the team members was like a tightly knit brotherhood.
meanings.sent5: The concept of homosociality can be seen in the exclusive men's clubs of the past.

meanings.definition: The tendency for individuals of the same sex to form social bonds and relationships.
meanings.sent1: Homosociality can lead to strong connections between coworkers of the same gender.
meanings.sent2: During college, homosociality often results in lifelong friendships.
meanings.sent3: The homosociality at the gym was so strong that they started a weekly workout group.
meanings.sent4: In the animal kingdom, homosociality can be observed in the behavior of male lions.
meanings.sent5: The power of homosociality is evident in the support system it creates among peers.
